Text:
Classification: Reality
Status: New Series
Network: Science Channel ( USA)

In Science Channel's first-ever game show, created by executive producer Whoopi Goldberg and her production company Whoop Inc, contestants bet the bank that they know the answers to some of science's craziest riddles. The "reel" stars of this show are the peculiar video clips used to showcase unexpected science trivia - from nature's oddities to startling lab experiments, "Head Games" will leave viewers learning and laughing. (Source: http://science.discovery.com/tv/head-games/head-games.html?c)

(http://www.tvrage.com/Head_Games)
